query:
INSERT INTO deliveryTerms (inspectionId, userId, protocolNumber, completionDate, responsibleTechnician, status, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (1, 1, CONCAT('TERMO-', UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), '-', FLOOR(RAND()*10000)), NOW(), 'Eng. Carlos Santos', 'draft', NOW(), NOW());
